# Jiri Destkird (Ú˜ÛŒØ±Ù‰ Ø¯Ù‡â€ŒØ³ØªÙƒØ±Ø¯) ðŸ§ âœ¨

A Python library for Deep Learning (DL) and Computer Vision (CV) utilities.

The name "Jiri Destkird" comes from the Kurdish words **"JirÃ®"** (meaning smart, clever, intelligent) and **"Destkird"** (meaning man-made, artificial), translating to **Artificial Intelligence** in the Kurdish language used in Kurdistan.

## Purpose

The goal of this project is to simplify and streamline common, everyday tasks in Deep Learning and Computer Vision, aiming for cleaner and more efficient code.

## Installation

```bash
pip install jiri_destkird
